import React from "react" import memesData from "../memesData.js" export default function Meme() { const [meme, setMemeImage] = React.useState({ topText: "", bottomText: "", randomImage: "http://i.imgflip.com/1bij.jpg" }) const [allmemeImages, setAllMemeImages] = React.useState(memesData) function getMemeImage() { const memesArray = allMemeImages.data.memes const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * memesArray.length) setMemeImage(memesArray[randomNumber].url) } return (
) }
